Lines.Description: If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000362
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000472
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000586
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000700
Say 'Just a simple sample to demonstrate printing strings'
Say 'I'm going to try loading a save file'
Say 'Loaded file. Last random number was $2:lastdice'
Say 'Could not load file (first time running this program?)'

Say 'I'm going to pick a number between 1 and 99...<5>
$2:Dice'
Say 'use < 1 ><1> to < 5 ><2> to insert <3> delays <4> in <5> text!'

Say 'Next is a demo of choices.
Yes to repeat
No to quit.
'
Say 'I'm going to try saving that number - $2:dice - to disk for next time'
